name: Monster Night Live 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Participate in the famous show Monster Night Live! Play a monster and infiltrate a human house to scare the kids. Use the environment to your advantage and assemble a disguise matching the kids' worst fears.... But be careful, don't get caught!

Platform : PC / Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players :1

Producer : Maxime JEHENNE
Game Design : Alexandra BORGEOT, Camille CAPON
Game Art : Morgane FERREIRA COELHO, Matéo MANJON-GUERIN, Adrien NETO
Game Programming : Axel DUBILLET, César RECOCHE
Game Design & Programming : Benjamin PAGEAUD
Music & Sound Design : Vincent SERGENT
